name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 28th is the tenth anniversary of Xi Jinping's dining at Beijing's Qingfeng Steamed Dumpling Shop.
Ten years ago, there was no disturbance to the people, no traffic control, and the outside world generally praised his "common people's nature".
Ten years later, all windows on every street he inspected must be completely closed and curtains drawn. Every "common people" he met became a pre-arranged actor.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 28, the death of a 14-year-old student at Yuhua Middle School in Ningling County, Shangqiu, Henan Province, further escalated. On that day, the scene was filled with mourning flowers. Angry people went to the school to protest and surrounded the leader's black car to demand an explanation. They had a fierce conflict and shoving with the police and drove the police away.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 27, Weifang, Shandong. A netizen posted a video saying that the roof of Liangcheng Capital Community had exposed steel bars and multiple cracks. He posted the situation on Douyin to defend his rights, but was met with dissatisfaction from other owners, who believed that this move would affect house prices and cause losses, and even removed the netizen from the owner group.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 27, Taiyuan City. Poly Champagne International owed workers wages, and the workers played funeral music at the sales office to protest their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 27, six villagers in Shizhai Community, Changsha Town, Kaizhou District, Chongqing fainted due to suspected gas poisoning and were sent to the hospital for emergency treatment, of which three died. 
According to the community staff, the accident occurred in a pit where a large number of citrus fruits were piled. One villager fell to the ground and became unconscious after going down the pit, and another villager also fell in the pit while trying to rescue him.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 25, some people went to Fengxi Town, Bazhou District to do business and found that the door of the local convenience service center was ajar, and there was only one person on duty in the hall. Many staff members claimed that there was no one on duty because of the heavy fog in the morning. 
The netizen also said that the door of the nearby Fengxi Town Mass Complaints Quick Handling Center was closed, the town government office building was also closed and locked, and the community new civilization practice station had not been open for a long time.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, as New Year's Day and the Spring Festival approach, many places have issued notices banning the sale and burning of fireworks and firecrackers.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Afterwards, some citizens took photos on the streets of dozens of special police buses rushing to the scene to maintain stability.

content: On December 28, Reuters reported that after the Mayday lip-syncing incident, mainland China put pressure on the band, requiring its members to make pro-mainland remarks before Taiwanâ€™s election, otherwise they would face investigations and fines.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 26, Tianjin University issued new regulations to strictly control the daily movements of foreign students, requiring them to go to a designated location on campus to sign in with their faces. 
They also threatened to take away scholarships, and if they violated the regulations, they would be disqualified from the scholarship review.

This was in Huaxian County, Henan Province in February this year.
